title: How many times can I try the screen unlock pattern before my phone becomes permanently locked? Can I unlock the phone by sending an email from my Gmail?
answer:
Your phone will not be locked even if you incorrectly draw the unlock pattern for several consecutive times, but you will have to wait for a while until you can try again.

Your phone supports the function to unlock the screen using the backup PIN. If you forget your unlock patterna nd backup PIN, please send your phone to the local customer service center.Â 

Your phone can not unlock using an email from Gmail.
